message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $10,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $6,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd be willing to go up to $7,500, but I think that's my limit. Can you meet me there?
